item.title: Key US and regional mediators join talks in push to end Gaza war
item.description: Steve Witkoff and Jared Kushner's arrival in Egypt comes after Hamas submitted a list of Palestinian prisoners it wants Israel to release in exchange ...

item.title: Gold surges past $4,000 an ounce as uncertainty fuels rally
item.description: Analysts point to delays in the reporting of economic data due to the US government shutdown as one reason for the rise.

item.title: At least 24 killed as army paraglider bombs Myanmar Buddhist festival
item.description: Locals tell the BBC the carnage has made it hard to identify victims of the military attack.

item.title: Israeli forces intercept new aid flotilla bound for Gaza
item.description: Activists on board nine vessels carrying food and medical supplies for Palestinians will be deported, Israel says.

item.title: Nigerian minister accused of forging qualifications resigns
item.description: The forgery allegations have sparked outrage among some Nigerians, following a newspaper expos√©.
